data.eml:eml: Revision of Brada Stimpson, 1853, and Bradabyssa Hartman, 1967 (Annelida, Flabelligeridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Salazar-Vallejo, Sergio I. (2017): Revision of Brada Stimpson, 1853, and Bradabyssa Hartman, 1967 (Annelida, Flabelligeridae). Zootaxa 4343 (1): 1-98, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4343.1.1
